title: Elon Musk Revealed To Be ‘Quietly’ Funding Crypto Rival To Bitcoin Amid Price Crash
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Elon Musk has been revealed to have been "quietly" funding the development of a major crypto rival to bitcoin...

title: Crypto Tycoon Jihan Wu’s Matrixport Mulls New Funding At $1.5 Billion Valuation
author: Zinnia Lee
description: Matrixport, the Singapore-based crypto financial services firm, has received $50 million in commitments from investors at a valuation of $1.5 billion, even amid a broad downturn in venture funding and uncertainty around the industry following the fallout from FTX’s bankruptcy.

title: Sequoia China-Backed Crypto Financial Services Firm Hits $2 Billion Valuation
author: Zinnia Lee
description: Babel Finance's latest funding round comes as the crypto market is struggling to recover from the spectacular collapse of TerraUSD and Luna.

title: NFT Creators Are Suddenly Losing A Major Source Of Income
author: Leeor Shimron
description: A major selling point for NFT creators is the ability to receive royalties from secondary sales. Those are now going away.
